urls.title: Trump halts US funding for World Health Organization as it conducts coronavirus review
urls.description: It's unclear exactly what mechanism Trump intends to use to withhold WHO funding, much of which is appropriated by Congress.

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Trump’s decision to cut funds from the World Health Organization—which is on the front lines of researching and delivering treatments for coronavirus—is deeply reckless and does nothing to distract from his mismanagement of this crisis from the beginning.
https://t.co/s2okefVgdd
